verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H3615"\w* duly celebrated, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w broke|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* idols, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w groves|strong="H5704"\w*. \w demolished|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w not|strong="H1121"\w* \w only|strong="H5704"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Manasses, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* utterly \w destroyed|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w possessions|strong="H0272"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w kingâ€™s|strong="H4428"\w* \w part|strong="H4480"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* proper substance \w the|strong="H4480"\w* holocaust \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* offered always \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* \w moons|strong="H2320"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* other solemnities, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Moses.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w portion|strong="H4521"\w*, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H4616"\w* attend \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Which|strong="H1697"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H0935"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* noised \w abroad|strong="H6555"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ears \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* offered \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1121"\w* corn, \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ground|strong="H7704"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H6555"\w*.

\w In|strong="H2320"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w they|strong="H2320"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H2320"\w* \w lay|strong="H3245"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w foundations|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H2320"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w heaps|strong="H6194"\w*, \w and|strong="H2320"\w* \w in|strong="H2320"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w they|strong="H2320"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* Ezechias \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w heaps|strong="H6194"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Azarias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* race \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Sadoc \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* firstfruits \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w offered|strong="H8641"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* store \w which|strong="H2088"\w* thou seest.

\w Then|strong="H0559"\w* Ezechias \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* storehouses \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H3559"\w* \w so|strong="H3559"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* after \w him|strong="H0430"\w* \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Azarias, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w Nahath|strong="H5184"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Asael, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Jesmachias, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w Mahath|strong="H4287"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Banaias, \w overseers|strong="H6496"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Chonenias, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Semei \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* commandment \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Azarias \w the|strong="H3027"\w* high priest \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H3027"\w* whom all \w things|strong="H5057"\w* appertained.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* Ezechias \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w which|strong="H3477"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* said \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wrought \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H3477"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*,
